*********************
ODPI-C Private Unions
*********************

The following unions are private unions used within ODPI-C and are not intended
to be used by any other code. They are subject to change at any point, without
warning. They are documented here for completeness and to provide insight into
the design used by ODPI-C.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    dpiOracleData<dpiOracleData.rst>
    dpiOracleDataBuffer<dpiOracleDataBuffer.rst>
    dpiReferenceBuffer<dpiReferenceBuffer.rst>
